"Paws-itively Purr-fect Learning" - A school where pets are trained to be teachers and help students learn.
"Furry Friends University" - A school that combines traditional learning with animal-assisted therapy.
"Paws-itively Sustainable Learning" - A school that incorporates sustainable practices into its curriculum.
"The Pet-acular School of Education" - A school that uses pets as a tool for socialization and emotional learning.
"Furry Friends Academy" - A school that combines education with animal rescue and rehabilitation.
